extension.name: Job log management
extension.description: This extension provides with an API that handles purging old job records. It accepts two parameters: 1. days_retained (required) = The number of days to retain records for. Any job logs older than that day range are purged. 2. api_call (optional) = Only purges logs of a specific type(e.g. job.versionCheck) if explicitly mentioned else deletes all based on the above param.
